name: PxBeats
summary: A perfect mix of RPG and music games.

name: PXL Play
summary:
“PXL Play” is the first character you’ll meet in this adventurous endless runner. His happy bright color grabs your attention, and he’s hungry for pixel points. And more friends.
Continue your adventure with PXL, enjoying achievements and surprising boosts in this stress-free and colorful pixel world. The ability to shrink and grow, accelerate, earn more pixel points and expand your collection of playful characters is limitless.

name: Px
summary:
Px is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2.
You play as an unnamed square who finds themself in a hollow world. The protagonist must explore and uncover the truth behind everything. In most areas, there is a notable NPC that you can talk to who'll quiz you or ask you to complete a task. The game has multiple endings based on the choices you make in the game.

name: Pxl-Ship
summary: PXL-SHIP Is a high score game! Survive the asteroid field as long as possible and try to defeat the destroyer! upgrade your ship and unlock different styles!
